LOL...does anyone know what a nephilim is? I researched it once. I think it's like a biblical monster.

posts.post_content: the niphilims were creatures from the Ravnica books. they were worshiped by the Gruul (the BR guild), until they realised they could kill them, i honestly dont know why the strongest one is a 3/3 though, in the books it took there guild master *and* an entire raiding party to kill it. so i would just have made them like 8/8 brutes, as they never really had any magic like abilities.

posts.post_content: Nephilim are the bastard offspring of angels and humans from the bible. I think magic was representing them as mirror images of what they should cost, so this is technically the "red" one. Think about how [Ink-Treader Nephilim](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ink-Treader Nephilim) has no black in it, yet goes perfectly in black resurrection decks.
